summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of portions of S.E. 1/4 of S.W. 1/4 of S.E. 1/4 of Sec. 19-26-4, with respect to Use and Area Districts; amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-451 and 17-325, respectively, and repealing Ordinance No. 85575.
